title: Boku no Hero Academia the Movie: Futari no Hero
alternative_title: My Hero Academia the Movie: The Two Heroes, 僕のヒーローアカデミア THE MOVIE ～2人の英雄（ヒーロー）～
description: Deku and All Might receive an invitation to I-Expo, the world’s leading exhibition of Quirk abilities and hero item innovations! Amid the excitement, sponsors, and pros from all over, Deku meets Melissa, a girl who is Quirkless just like he once was. Suddenly, I-Expo’s top-of-the-line security system gets hacked by villains, and a sinister plan is set in motion. It’s a serious threat to hero society, and one man holds the key to it all—the symbol of peace, All Might.
genre: [<Genre -> Action>, <Genre -> Comedy>, <Genre -> School>, <Genre -> Shounen>, <Genre -> Super Power>]
